long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Here’s a simple way to browse Web sites and clip photos of houses you like for your Dream House Design Projects. With only a single click on a photo, the Matrix Clipper copies both the photo and its description to the Matrix Clipboard. Sign in at DreamHouseDesign.com, open one or more Design Projects and receive your personal Matrix Clipboard. Your Matrix Clipboard is a common resource for all your Projects and can store as many photos as you like for you to paste into your Design Projects.
